tool_description: Buy and sell handmade or vintage items, art and supplies on Etsy, the world's most vibrant handmade marketplace.
name: Etsy
title: Etsy

api_list.name: findAllListingActive
api_list.description: Finds all active Listings. (Note: the sort_on and sort_order options only work when combined with one of the search options: keywords, color, tags, location, etc.)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-etsy.p.rapidapi.com/listings/active"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-etsy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: findAllCurrentFeaturedListings
api_list.description: Finds FeaturedTreasury listings that are currently displayed on a regional homepage.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-etsy.p.rapidapi.com/featured_treasuries/listings/homepage_current"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-etsy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
